author: Sethapedia
comment: Have a moto 360. I did not get the notification as specified in the tutorial. Any developer tips would be helpful, and if can be shown to work I will re purchase

reply.author: Andreas Neustifter
reply.content:
Sorry for the delay. Unfortunately this is an issue with Android Wear. Rarely the "New watch app" notification does not show. 
To get Tiled Watchface reliably:
- [phone] Install Tiled Watchface from Google Play
- [watch] Open the Play Store
- [watch] Scroll all the way down and install Tiled Watchface
[UPDATE] Any luck? Latest should be good.

author: Jim Thibault
comment: Wish my watch was not round, the latest version is great

reply.author: Andreas Neustifter
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, I have overlooked your latest change to the comments. Sorry. Can't help you with the square watch, btw :)

author: Doron Reinis
comment: I installed it and it doesn't work. You can't even see it in the phone or watch

reply.author: Andreas Neustifter
reply.content:
Unfortunately, watchfaces not showing up on the watch is a long-standing issue with Android Wear and outside my influence.

[Edit June 7th, 2017] Is this issue resolved? I hope you can use Tiled Watchface now?

comment: Edited to 5 stars the developer contacted and clarified, i like the tiles and it makes the watch look modern and i like all the color options.  Good job with the watch face

reply.author: Andreas Neustifter
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback and your updated review!
